Description: The return of the Holy Family from Egypt, after Giovanni da San Giovanni. 1730 Etching
Curator's comments: See Massar. The fresco by Giovanni da San Giovanni was part of a cycle on the Flight into Egypt in the Medici palace of the Crocetta. The whole cycle was transferred in 1788 to the Spedale di San Matteo, now part of the Accademia di Belle Arti.
Bibliographic references: Massar 1998 / The prints of Francesco Zuccarelli (7)
Associated names: Associated with: Francesco Maria Niccolò Gabburri
